item.title: Git for Document Management
item.description: The idea for this came to me while exploring and contributing to open source communities. It was (and still is) quite impressive how well these communities self govern using the Git version control system. Developers use the Git system to maintain a record of any changes to programming files and to me I couldn’t see why we couldn’t use the same system for documents. The Markdown language One downside to using Git for document management is the need to use plain text files and the Markdown language.
